input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Connecting HyperX Cloud II Wireless Headset

I'm having connectivity problems with my HyperX Cloud II Wireless Headset across different software like Zoom and Spotify My name is Fatima Al-Farsi.. I've tried updating drivers and reconfiguring settings, but the issues still persist You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. I've followed some troubleshooting steps, but the problem remains. I suspect it might be due to outdated drivers or software conflicts. I would greatly appreciate any assistance in resolving this issue to ensure compatibility with my applications. Could you please provide additional troubleshooting steps or recommendations to resolve this issue? I look forward to your help.
